section.heading: Stay of proceedings pending appeal of foreign-country judgment.
section.text: If a party establishes that an appeal from a foreign-country judgment is pending or will be taken, the court may stay any proceedings with regard to the foreign-country judgment until the:

para.text: Appellant has had sufficient time to prosecute the appeal and has failed to do so.

annoGroup.heading: Editor's Notes
annoGroup.annotation: Uniform Law: This section is based on § 8 of the Uniform Foreign-Country Money Judgments Recognition Act.
